title: LFM Plat+ Team, currently Gold3 on ladder
body:
Recently recruited a team of plats that has done provisionals and placed in gold 3. I believe this is a really good standing, and more then enough of a challenge for players of plat skill level. Unfortunately, I had to say goodbye to a couple of toxic players that were alienating their teammates, and a couple of players that never showed any actual interest in playing. So now i need a couple more recruits!

If you believe you fit the mold:

platinum season 4
ranked 5s experience
main top/jungle (bruisers/tanks)

I'm really interested in getting a senior member on board to coach and inspire the team, preferably high plat/diamond season 4. This person will be solely responsible for team direction and critique.

please add me IGN: Neosinf
